name: NETXP LINUX Mount/Unmount syscall on Linux machine
description: This rule is configured to monitor mount and unmount operations on a Linux system. It generates audit events whenever the mount or umount2 system calls are executed, specifically on 64-bit architectures. The rule excludes events where the audit user ID is unknown (auid!=-1). The key "mount" is assigned to the generated events for easy identification and tracking.
author: Szymon Gluch
